page.title: 05ASHDOWN HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: { ABOUT THE PRACTICE The centre is situated in Forest Row village.The practice occupies a modern ,spacious and detached building.It has several wings to it and it also has two floors to it.These are designed specially to cater for the special services offered,we will mention these later.There are five partners(doctors) in the practice.There are three full and two part time doctors.DR.Hardy is the senior partner. The centre has 9,600 patients in it's books.It also has a very large catchment area:350 square miles. There is only one chemist in the village,but Miss Millington(DR.Hardy's secretary)said that this is adequate. There are several chemists in near by {East Grinstead}(3.5 miles away),and one of these stays open until 9:00pm.
